All About Me | Your Updated People & Culture Hub Is Here!
We are happy to introduce a refreshed People & Culture experience on One Chalhoub <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1460&user=10620> , your central hub for everything you need to connect, navigate, and grow at Chalhoub Group.
The updated space brings together essential tools, resources, and information to make your daily interactions with People & Culture simpler, faster, and more seamless.
Start exploring, make it part of your daily flow, and let us know what you think!
View more here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1459&user=10620> . 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-1-min.png> 	

Mid-Year 
Check-Ins

All About Me | Your Updated People & Culture Hub Is Here!
We are happy to introduce a refreshed People & Culture experience on One Chalhoub <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1460&user=10620> , your central hub for everything you need to connect, navigate, and grow at Chalhoub Group.

Start exploring, make it part of your daily flow, and let us know what you think!
View more here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1459&user=10620> . 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-1-min.png> 	

Mid-Year 
Check-Ins

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1461&user=10620> 	

Mid-Year Check-Ins are a chance to reflect, realign, and plan ahead. The 360 Review Tool brings an added layer of insight by gathering feedback from colleagues. With a more rounded view of your strengths and development areas, the check-in becomes a deeper, more purposeful conversation, one that supports growth and alignment for the months ahead.
ðŸ”— Access the 360 Review Tool and more on the My Performance page <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1461&user=10620>

Plastic Free July

Mid-Year Check-Ins are a chance to reflect, realign, and plan ahead. The 360 Review Tool brings an added layer of insight by gathering feedback from colleagues. With a more rounded view of your strengths and development areas, the check-in becomes a deeper, more purposeful conversation, one that supports growth and alignment for the months ahead.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-6-min.png> 	

Plastic Free July

Week 2 Challenge â€“ Shop Without Plastic
Snap a fun or creative photo, GIF, or video of your plastic-free shopping reusable totes and post it here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1462&user=10620> .
Bonus points if you tag a colleague and challenge them to join in!
Letâ€™s rethink the way we shop and cut down on single-use plastics together.
The most creative entry wins a prize!

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1462&user=10620>

<https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1462&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-1-min.png> 	

Introducing OMNISTART!

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1463&user=10620> 	

Aligned with our Vision 2033, OMNISTART helps us all speak the same Omni language; whether in-store, online, or behind the scenes. This beginner-level course will build a common understanding of how we can connect experiences across every touchpoint to delight our customers and drive sustainable growth.
Start your OMNISTART journey here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1463&user=10620> !

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/04-3-min.png> 	

A Lookback at last weekâ€™s UAE Culture Bootcamp

Last week, our team members experienced our Group's 'One Team, One Culture' in action. They explored our values, gained fresh perspectives, and connected with the diverse mindsets driving our cultural evolution
Want to be part of the next one? Click here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1464&user=10620>  to sign up for the 24 September session in HO2!

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1464&user=10620> 	
For inquiries and to share your news in the Internal News please contact rasha.nashashibi@chalhoub.com <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1465&user=10620>
